sample_user.my_why: I want to stay current with technology trends and become a better team lead. Continuous learning helps me solve complex problems and mentor junior developers effectively.
sample_user.about_me: Senior Angular developer with 5 years experience. Passionate about clean code, user experience, and building scalable applications. Currently working on improving my leadership and communication skills.

sample_team_comments.comment: Great progress on the Angular performance optimization! The implementation of OnPush strategy in the recent project showed measurable improvements. Consider documenting your learnings for the team.
Your communication during the client presentation was much clearer than before. The technical concepts were well explained. Keep practicing with the active listening techniques we discussed.
Consider focusing more on practical application of leadership concepts. Maybe volunteer to lead the next sprint planning meeting?
